attributes.action: Force ALL MPs to resign and declare Parliament "Not fit for purpose"
attributes.background: The MPs of the current Government have handled Brexit negotiations so badly that they need to be accountable for their actions and to stop receiving expenses & salary as they are not fit to serve the people.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions. 

This would be a decision for individual MP's and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
